data.title: SBF Named in Deceptive Marketing Lawsuit
data.meta_description: SBF named in deceptive marketing lawsuit - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a class action complaint filed against Sam Bankman-Fried and other individuals and entities related to the collapse of cryptocurrency exchange FTX. The complaint alleges that FTX offered yield-bearing accounts to customers that were unregistered securities, in violation of securities laws. It further alleges that celebrity endorsements of FTX by some defendants did not properly disclose compensation received, violating disclosure requirements. The complaint seeks to recover damages for investors who lost money when FTX collapsed and filed for bankruptcy.
